title: N.Y. Comp. Codes R. & Regs. Tit. 1 ยง 26.3 - Retention of notice and return receipt
content:
N.Y. Comp. Codes R. & Regs. Tit. 1 ยง 26.3 - Retention of notice and return receipt

State Regulations

The milk dealer shall keep the signed, returned receipt and
a copy of the written notice as evidence of the commencement of the 30-day
notice period and retain the signed receipt and copy of the said notice for one
year from the date appearing on the said receipt. Notes
N.Y. Comp. Codes R. & Regs. Tit. 1
ยง
26.3

State regulations are updated quarterly; we currently have two versions available. Below is a
comparison between our most recent version and the prior quarterly release. More comparison features will be added as we have more versions to compare. No prior version found.
